abstract: Countrywide Home Loans, the troubled mortgage lender that has agreed to be sold to the Bank of America, engaged in questionable conduct in a bankruptcy case involving two borrowers in Atlanta, the United States Trustee contended in a lawsuit filed late Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Countrywide Home Loans, the troubled mortgage lender that has agreed to be sold to the Bank of America, engaged in questionable conduct in a bankruptcy case involving two borrowers in Atlanta, the United States Trustee contended in a lawsuit filed late Thursday.
